content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Marymount, Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(March 2019)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Bishan Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Marymount** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 玛丽蒙, [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): மேரிமவுண்ட்) is a residential district in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Its boundary is made up of Ang Mo Kio Avenue in [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio,_Singapore) in the north, [Bishan](/wiki/Bishan,_Singapore) Road in the east, Braddell Road in the south and Marymount Road in the west. ## Etymology The area takes its name from the Marymount Convent School, which in turn was named [Mary, the mother of Jesus](/wiki/Mary,_mother_of_Jesus). 1°21′14″N 103°50′12″E﻿ / ﻿1.3539°N 103.8368°E﻿ / 1.3539; 103.8368 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Marymount, Singapore
